programme.title: Help! We Bought a Village

programme.title: A New Life in the Sun

programme.title: Kirstie and Phils Love It or List It
programme.desc: Phil heads back to Waterbeach to catch up with Amber and Martin, who were struggling with their three-bed semi. Amber was fed up with the higgledy-piggledy layout, but Martin loved their sizeable home, as it gave him enough space for all his spiders.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Leah Charles-King is in Spains Mar Menor to help Eileen from Birmingham find the perfect holiday home. Eileen ideally wants a two-bedroom apartment near the beach, and with a maximum budget of £43,500, Leah lines up five great options.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Sisters Ros and Elizabeth look for a magnifique place in Bergerac for £350k. Will a grand country home, picture-perfection or a place ticking boxes by the minute have the je ne sais quoi?

programme.title: Come Dine with Me

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Its the second night in Boston and host, competitions fanatic Katy, is convinced her organised approach will help her bag this weeks cash prize.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Its night three in Boston, and time for the only man in the competition to host. Adrian is hoping his spicy food and surprises will help him bag the prize, although it could be those surprises that end up costing him first place.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Its day four in Boston and Polish-born carer, Sylwia, is putting on a very European menu, hoping to charm with top notch cooking that takes her guests on a tour of all the places shes lived in the world.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Its the final night in Boston, and hard to please fox hunter, Carolyn, is planning on a charm offensive to win over the guests shes criticised all week.

programme.desc: Where else but London?! A one-bedroom flat has a potential value of one million pounds if renovated properly. Martel is assessing 25 acres of land in Anglesey. Martin is in Bristol where he disagrees with the new owner about his plans for the layout.

programme.title: Bargain Hunt

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: A young, canine-loving couple from Hertfordshire are hoping for a fresh start in a new High Weald home and, with their budget of £600,000, Ginny Buckley has some tempting properties to show them. Away from the houses, Ginny gets to grips picking some of the local grape harvest, before treating herself to a glass of fizz.

programme.title: The Repair Shop: On the Road
programme.desc: Will and Dom learn how a devastating fire put a 5,000-year-old craft in jeopardy, Chris Shaw repairs a Gaelic pipe music book, and Dom has the chance to make his own sporran.

programme.title: The Inner Circle
programme.desc: Amanda Holden hosts the quiz, packed with strategy, high stakes and surprises, where players must outsmart each other to win big. Six players are each randomly assigned a secret stash of cash - anything between zero and a whopping £4,000.

programme.title: Pointless
programme.desc: Alexander Armstrong is joined by co-host Judi Love for the brainy quiz where the contestants try to score as few points as possible by plumbing the depths of their general knowledge to come up with the answers no-one else could think of.

programme.title: Policing Paradise
programme.desc: The island paradise of Bermuda is just 21 square miles, and to limit traffic congestion, locals are restricted to having just one car per household. This means motorbikes and scooters are Bermudas most popular mode of transport. The theft of two-wheeled vehicles is a big problem. We follow officer Bryden Pedro and his partner Shandora Burrows on the trail of the bike thieves in a bid to crack down on the five motorbikes being stolen each day.

programme.title: DIY SOS
programme.desc: In south London, Nick and the team help five siblings who recently lost their mum. Eldest Somer and Samuel are doing their best, but the family is struggling in a cramped home.

programme.title: Joe Swash: Forgotten Young Dads
programme.desc: Too often overlooked in research and marginalised in society, many young dads across the UK are quietly rewriting the rulebook on fatherhood. In this revealing documentary, Joe Swash, who became a first-time father in his mid-twenties, meets four young men navigating the challenges of parenting. From stigma and financial strain to isolation and emotional growth, this is the rarely seen lived experience of men in their teens and twenties entering into fatherhood.

programme.title: Weatherman Walking
programme.desc: On a mission to dig out some of his greatest adventures from the past, Derek revisits three memorable walks from mid-Wales. On his first wander, he is joined by opera singer Beverley Humphreys as they walk in the footsteps of one of historys most impressive sopranos atthe Craig-Y-Nos estate. He learns of the epic barefoot 26-mile journey of a devoted teenage girl in Abergynolwyn. Finally, Derek takes the plunge at the bog snorkelling world championships in Llanwrtyd Wells.

programme.title: World Championship Artistic Gymnastics LIVE
programme.desc: Coverage of the 2025 World Gymnastics Championships.

programme.title: Political Thinking with Nick Robinson
programme.desc: Nick Robinson has a conversation with, not an interrogation of, the people who shape our political thinking about what shaped theirs.

programme.title: Impossible
programme.desc: Thirty players compete across the series, scoring points by answering questions correctly. However, they must avoid the impossible answers, otherwise they will be eliminated from the show until the next day.

programme.title: The Finish Line
programme.desc: Roman Kemp and sidekick Sarah Greene host the quiz show where contestants race on moving podiums across the studio floor. Correct answers get the players moving, while wrong answers will stop them in their tracks.

programme.title: Unbeatable
programme.desc: Today, Cole, Charlie, Karen and Charlotte battle it out to see which one of them is unbeatable.

programme.title: Great British Menu

programme.desc: The remaining three chefs from south west England compete over mains and desserts celebrating great Britons of the past. Who will win, and who must go home?

programme.title: Wonders of the Monsoon
programme.desc: During the part of the year that the monsoon doesnt bring rain, the winds reverse, bringing instead dry air and even drought to large parts of the region.

programme.title: Flog It!
programme.desc: `Flog It! brings you a collection of interesting and previously unseen finds from the shows travels round the country - visiting Margam Country Park in south Wales, Highcliffe Castle in Dorset and Powderham Castle in Devon.

programme.title: Richard Osmans House of Games
programme.desc: Kola Bokinni, Sheli McCoy, John Parrott and Katie Piper test their general knowledge skills on this weeks House of Games.

programme.title: Strictly Come Dancing: It Takes Two
programme.desc: Janette Manrara ends the week with more Strictly exclusives and chats to some of the remaining couples. She is also joined by a star-studded Friday Panel to discuss this weekends iconic dances as the couples rehearse their next performances in the ballroom.

programme.title: Monty Dons Spanish Gardens
programme.desc: Monty journeys across the south of the country, from the island of Mallorca to the capital of Andalusia, Seville. Its warm, Mediterranean climate and rugged landscape have been a magnet for many.

programme.title: Gardeners World
programme.desc: As the autumn light bathes Longmeadow, Monty is harvesting pumpkins in time for Halloween, adding a berberis to his orchard border and planting out strawberries.

programme.title: Agatha Christie: Lucy Worsley on the Mystery Queen
programme.desc: On the evening of 3 December 1926, Agatha Christie left her home in Sunningdale, Berkshire, in her Morris Cowley. The next morning, the car was found abandoned, balanced precariously on the edge of a quarry.

programme.title: QI
programme.sub-title: Series W: Wales, Whales and Wails
programme.desc: Sandi Toksvig considers Wales, whales, and wails with Elis James, Griff Rhys Jones, Kiri Pritchard-McLean and Alan Davies.

programme.title: Newsnight
programme.desc: Featuring extensive coverage of the days top national and international news stories, along with explanations about the context and potential aftereffects.

programme.title: BBC Weather
programme.desc: The latest weather forecast.

programme.title: Halloween
programme.desc: A murderous lunatic escapes incarceration and returns to his home town intent on reliving his crime. Fifteen years before, on Halloween night, the boy had forsaken trick-or-treating to viciously stab his sister to death. Now he is pursued by the doctor who has pronounced him to be evil personified.

programme.title: Shadow in the Cloud
programme.desc: While travelling with top-secret documents on a B-17 Flying Fortress, a female WWII pilot encounters an evil presence on board.

programme.title: Riot Women
programme.desc: Chaotic Kitty Eckersley bursts into rehearsals. The women begin to gel, only for Kitty to suddenly realise a heartbreaking connection she has to Beth.

programme.title: Panorama
programme.sub-title: The Race to Build 1.5 Million Homes
programme.desc: The governments made a very big promise: to build 1.5 million new homes in England by 2029. Anita Rani and Justin Rowlatt travel the length of the country to find out if it can be done.

programme.title: This Is BBC TWO
programme.desc: Preview of upcoming programmes from BBC Two.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.sub-title: Morel in the Dark; Save The Fun Tree; Stuck In The Mud; Get The Egg Home; Fly, Chase, Fly
programme.desc: Mush-Mush and his best friends Chep and Lilit have all kinds of adventures in the forest. They are the protectors of the forest and they all have a unique power.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.sub-title: What a Stinker; The Art of Friendship; The Rollinator; Star Helpers
programme.desc: Mush-Mush and his best friends Chep and Lilit have all kinds of adventures in the forest. They are the protectors of the forest and they all have a unique power.

programme.title: Moley
programme.sub-title: Magic Rectangle; Guacamoley; Three Gentlemen of Moletown; Who Arted; Trash Trash Trash!
programme.desc: Revolving around an adventurous moles quest with friends to broker peace between humans and moles. Following the underground adventures of the charmingly optimistic young mole, Moley.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo! Mystery Incorporated
programme.sub-title: The House of the Nightmare Witch
programme.desc: With everyone back together, the guys formulate a plan to take down a witch thats intent on using her giant house to kidnap people.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo, Where Are You!
programme.desc: The gang investigate the legend of Captain Cutler when Scooby crashes his surfboard into a ghost wearing a deep-sea diving suit.

programme.title: Whats New Scooby-Doo?
programme.desc: While in Tokyo the gang suspect that Shaggy has fallen victim to a curse that turns him into a monster each night as he sleeps.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo: Best of Daphne
programme.desc: The gang decide go to a Victorian murder mystery party so they can dress up and experience solving a fake mystery for once, and all is going well until an actual headless Count appears.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo and Guess Who?
programme.desc: A robot is wrecking havoc at the grand opening of Laila Alis boxing museum. The gang must stop him before its too late.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: When the ghost of a small towns founder returns to scare off mayoral candidates, the gang decides to run Velma as mayor to bait the ghost. They quickly discover however, that Velma lacks the skill set to make her a popular politician.

programme.title: Whats New Scooby-Doo?
programme.sub-title: Camp Comeoniwannascareya; Block Long Hong Kong Terror
programme.desc: Mystery solving adventures with Fred, Velma, Daphne, Shaggy and Scooby.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Scooby-Doo and his friends hit the road in the Mystery Machine after high school ends to live it up one last summer before adulthood.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo and Guess Who?
programme.sub-title: Falling Star Man!; Dark Diner of Route 66!
programme.desc: Our gang of mystery solvers is run off the road by a shooting star that crashes down in the middle of the ranch belonging to famous football hall of famer Terry Bradshaw! / Scooby and Shaggy meet up with their biker buddy.

programme.title: Whats New Scooby-Doo?
programme.sub-title: New Mexico, Old Monster; Its All Greek to Scooby
programme.desc: The gang travels to New Mexico and finds a giant, legendary bird that carries the locals off to its mysterious lair. A medallion Shaggy wears apparently causes an ancient myth to come to life as the Mystery Inc gang travels in Greece.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Shaggy and Scoobys favourite chef finally opens his own restaurant but a monstrous Yeti threatens the opening night. The gang get caught up in an extra-terrestrial nightmare.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo and Guess Who?
programme.sub-title: Fear of the Fire Beast!; Too Many Dummies!
programme.desc: When Scooby and the gang are in Sicily, theyre chasing a fire monster! Theyre surprised to meet up with famous actor Steve Buscemi. / When Scooby and the gang are hired to escort a possessed ventriloquist dummy.

programme.title: Whats New Scooby-Doo?
programme.sub-title: Big Appetite in Little Tokyo; Theres No Creature Like Snow Creature
programme.desc: Shaggy becomes the victim of a curse that turns him into a giant monster each night as he sleeps. Scooby and the gang investigate claims that snow boarders are being attacked by an ice monster ahead of a big competition.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Scooby-Doo and his friends hit the road in the Mystery Machine after high school ends to live it up one last summer before adulthood.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo: Best of Monsters
programme.desc: Using the four keys, the gang finds the treasure chamber and the Evil Entity, who reveals a secret that could change their lives forever.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo and Guess Who?
programme.sub-title: The Horrible Haunted Hospital of Dr. Phineas Phrag!
programme.desc: The gang and Kristen Schaal investigate a hospital that is haunted by the ghost of a 1950s doctor named Phineas Phrag.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo! Mystery Incorporated
programme.desc: A wild creature is stealing jewellery from the residence of Crystal Cove. Meanwhile Freds real parents are in town with a dog that catches Scoobys eye.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo: Best Adventures
programme.desc: A trip to Niagra Falls lands the gang in the middle of an adventure involving a mysterious sanitariam, empty ambulances, and the ghost of a mad doctor who seems to be haunting the area.

programme.title: Whats New Scooby-Doo?
programme.desc: The gang go to Paris to see Daphnes cousin become Model of the Year, where they find shes been abducted by a giant gargoyle.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo and Guess Who?
programme.desc: The gang are in Austria to support Daphne when she enters the International Ice Games. However, the event is cancelled when a monster appears.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: When an Artificial Intelligence takes over the building of a trendy tech company, the Gang has to solve the computerised mystery and learn a lesson about relying on technology.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo, Where Are You!

programme.desc: Scoob and the gang investigate the legend of the werewolf when they come across mysterious footprints and the sound of a howling wolf.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo! Mystery Incorporated
programme.desc: Close to finally unraveling what happened to the original Mystery Incorporated kids, the gang finds The Obliteratrix standing in their way. Now, up against this vicious undead assassin who has vowed to destroy them, the gangs only chance to solve the mystery and stay alive is to seek help from an old friend - HP Hatecraft.

programme.title: Boy Girl Dog Cat Mouse Cheese
programme.desc: Boys afraid of being honest in case he hurts other peoples feelings and finds himself doing things he doesnt like just to keep others happy.

programme.title: Newsround
programme.desc: News magazine keeping young viewers up to date with the latest stories and events happening at home and abroad.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy wakes up from his dreams from all the noise made by the lemmings, who are perched on sheep, jousting. The cunning bear plays a trick on the lemmings using food. The rodents hatch a plan to take revenge by keeping the bear away from the castle.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy pursues the Lemmings throughout the castle to recover the jelly cake they stole from him. In an impasse, the bear runs smack into a ghost.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob visits his old pal Bubble Buddys hometown which is called Bubbletown.

programme.title: Odd Squad

programme.title: The Strange Chores
programme.desc: Two aspiring warrior-heroes and a lively ghost girl refine the skills they need to take the place of an ageing monster-slayer by completing his odd, supernatural chores.

programme.title: Danny and Mick

programme.title: Bitesize: 7-9 Year Olds
programme.desc: Apostrophes for contraction, apostrophes for possession, using commas in a list.

programme.title: Hey You What If?
programme.desc: Imagine if there was a thermostat that could turn the world temperature down. But be careful, a few degrees too far and could cause an ice age.

programme.title: Out of This World
programme.desc: Dr Maggie reveals that no matter how much you plan, prepare and practise for space travel, things can sometimes go wrong. Dr Maggies star guest is Professor David Southwood CBE.

programme.title: Our School
programme.desc: The girls reconnect with family for a revealing new history project, and Teni throws herself into a self-defence class after homesickness hits. Meanwhile, some of the boarders are treated to a surprise visit.

programme.title: DIY Deadly with Steve Backshall
programme.desc: Steve focuses on parks and gardens. This green space may look pristine, but for wildlife its savannah, jungle and mountains all rolled in to one. And judging by the most observant viewers, its packed full of deadly animals.

programme.title: One Zoo Three
programme.desc: The brothers meet the zoos youngest animals as Cam helps give two snow leopard cubs a health check. Plus, its time to say goodbye to Tashi the red panda as he begins a new adventure.

programme.title: The Dengineers
programme.desc: The presenters look back at all the amazing dens the team have built throughout the series and reminisce about the great kids, the tense surprises and the big reveals.

programme.title: Absolute Genius: Monster Builds
programme.desc: Dick and Dom go on a thrill-ride through the engineering genius of roller coasters and water slides. They learn how coasters stay on the track when upside down and research the science behind the worlds fastest waterslides.

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: A special episode about the great French leader Napoleon Bonaparte, starring Jim Howick. Following Napoleon as he rises from humble beginnings to be the Emperor of France, bashing most of Europe along the way, and ultimately meeting his Waterloo at, well, Waterloo!

programme.title: Our Black History Heroes
programme.desc: Tariq sings the praises of Jamaican singer, songwriter and musician Bob Marley.

programme.title: Danny and Mick

However, it is not as easy as it looks, and Danny and Mick make sure Mrs Harris boss, Dame Frost, fires her and brings Sharon back to get things back under control.

programme.desc: Bing and Sula are painting in the garden. When Bing cleans his brush and accidentally knocks the water over, he goes to fill it up from the garden tap. Is this something Hedgley the hedgehog can help them with?

programme.desc: Norman wants to get a pet dinosaur, but Nick and the Popcasters dont think this is a good idea. They try to convince Norman to pick another pet.

programme.title: Justins House
programme.desc: Justin decides to dig up a dinosaur and turn Justins House into a dinosaur museum.

programme.title: Bing
programme.desc: Its vaccination day! Bing knows it might hurt a little but he is looking forward to the special shiny Hoppity Voosh sticker he will get from Doctor Molly. Bing is brave, but when he goes to get his sticker after his vaccination, he finds out that there are none left! Bing is upset- but then Pando mistakes Bings disappointment for pain, and Doctor Bing has to help.

programme.title: Yakka Dee
programme.desc: Yakka Dee! celebrates children communicating - because talking fills you up with whizz, pop, bang! In this episode, Dee encourages a friend to say car and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. We see lots of different cars and explore how they look and what they do. We see a big car, a little car and a child whose bed is a car. Theres a yucky dirty car, Dee takes a bath with a clean car and someone has a car cake for their birthday.

programme.title: Lu and the Bally Bunch
programme.desc: Lu gets scared when she meets a huge Tara at the library. Lu wants Dad to play with her while hes working from home. Lu has trouble finding a new book she enjoys as much as her last one. The bugs talk about books they love.

programme.title: Piggy Builders
programme.desc: The full moon makes Wilf howl so loudly that a rockslide blocks Brians door. Now, the Piggies must help Brian escape - and find a way to stop Wilf from howling.

programme.title: Twirlywoos
programme.desc: The Twirlywoos visit a house where a very noisy parrot lives. The Twirlywoos enjoy copying the parrots movements, which excites the parrot, causing it to squawk very loudly indeed.

programme.title: Something Special
programme.desc: Justin and his friends visit a cafe and find George from the CBeebies House there. Meanwhile, Baker Tumble plans a surprise tea party for Mr Tumble.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies accidentally leave the Tiddlytubbies gate open, and some of them escape into Home Dome. The Teletubbies must find them all and then close the gate.

programme.title: The Baby Club
programme.desc: Giovanna and Baby Bear welcome babies Tobias, Inam, Isaac, Enya, Hawa, Jean and their grown-ups to The Baby Club. Parents, carers and their babies at home are invited to join in with all the fun activities too! Inside everyones bags in this episode are shakers and rattles which are explored through discovery, play, song and story. Grown-ups at home are encouraged to take part by hiding baby appropriate shaker or rattle inside a fabric bag or pillowcase.

programme.title: I Spy, You Spy
programme.desc: Elsee visits a market stall with her friend Annabelle to play a game of I Spy.

programme.title: Maddie and Triggs
programme.desc: While playing at the beach, Maddie and Triggs try to save their sandcastle from the incoming tide, in order to provide a fancy home for their magical new friend, Sailor Nancy.

programme.title: Dylans Playtime Adventures
programme.desc: Dylan the florist wants to make the best bouquet ever, but one of his customers wants the rarest flower in the world.

programme.title: Kiri and Lou
programme.desc: Kiri loves to swing on vines, but one day a vine breaks, causing her to fly through the air and get stuck in a tree.

programme.title: Vegesaurs
programme.desc: Ginger and the baby Pea-Rexes guide a young Strawberrisaurus to find the courage to perform a special friendship dance that will help them find a lifelong playmate.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: As Honey waits impatiently for her appointment with Dr Bingo, the family distracts her by pretending to work in the hospital.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: Duggee and the Squirrels set off on a warmup run together as the Squirrels are feeling sleepy, but are told that a bit of exercise will wake them up. They learn how others like to exercise, and the benefits that you gain from it.

programme.title: The Game Catchers
programme.desc: The Game Catchers land on a sandy planet and make all-seeing friends.

programme.title: Timmy Time
programme.desc: The class are making items out of folded paper, and Timmy is amazed by Finlays fantastic paper plane. He tries to copy him, but Timmys effort just wont fly like Finlays. Timmy is losing heart, until Finlays plane gets stuck in a tree, and Timmy gets a great idea.

programme.title: Our Family
programme.desc: When Henry and his family go on a trip to a nearby pond, its fishing nets at the ready as they try their hand at a spot of shrimping. Its not easy as the tiny shrimp are good at hiding. Luckily, Henry comes up with a plan.

programme.title: My World Kitchen
programme.desc: Todays talented chef takes us to Mexico, cooking a traditional dish called enchiladas. Marinas dad has shown her how to make the recipe, which she really loves to eat. Marina grates, mixes and wraps up all her ingredients in tortilla bread and finishes with a squeeze of lime. Marinas friends taste the lime before they arrive, but they think it is a bit sour. Hopefully they will be impressed by her cooking and her special guest musicians: a traditional mariachi band.

programme.title: Teeny Tiny Creatures
programme.desc: James finds out all about some very cool sea creatures - starfish. Chantelle is with Dawood to investigate different types of starfish - one with chocolate chips and another that looks like a cushion.

programme.title: Whats on Your Head?
programme.desc: Rajvatan, who is a Sikh, tells us all about his terrific turban and what it means for him to wear it.

programme.title: Time for School
programme.desc: As the children arrive, there is a rainbow over the school. Mrs Farrell points it out to Bryn before they head inside to create their own rainbow on the carpet. The rainbow has disappeared and the rain has stopped, so some of the children go outside for a game of hide-and-seek in the forest area. They soon find a hammock and take it in turns to try it out whilst the others sing a nursery rhyme. Back inside, its time for some more nursery rhymes with music teacher Miss Usher.

programme.title: Graces Amazing Machines
programme.desc: Motorbike rider Grace shows off three amazing machines that all move because of propellers. Grace flies a seaplane, shows off unusual hydrocopter and goes for a fast ride in a raceboat.

programme.title: Yakka Dee
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say `pizza, and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. We see lots of pizza, a round pizza, a tomato pizza, a party pizza and a cheesy pizza! Theres also a banana pizza, and Dee plays a game of ping pong with a pizza.

programme.title: Numberblocks
programme.desc: Seven shows the others how to be lucky: ask a number friend to jump on your head! But how do you know which friend? Find out how to tell the difference between two numbers with the Numberblocks.

programme.title: Alphablocks
programme.desc: When I finds some invisible ink, she plays all kinds of incredible tricks on the other Alphablocks, but soon wishes she hadnt.

programme.title: Wonderblocks
programme.desc: Go wants to surprise Toad with a colourful pattern tower, but she needs Artys help.

programme.title: Colourblocks
programme.desc: Sing along with Orange as she helps Indigo and Violet to colour a rainbow.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: The Squirrels are out doing their exercises when, suddenly, a cheetah called Chipo comes along with his dance crew. He criticises them for not being able to dance in time, and it turns out Duggee used to be part of the dance crew. Duggee was a great dancer, but he never stuck to the choreography and was always making up his own moves. But the Squirrels dont know what choreography is. The Rock Slippy Crew show off some impressive moves but keep criticising Duggees moves.

programme.title: Yukee
programme.desc: Yukee discovers a little mouse who is lost in the woods. A musical song map may help Frida find her way back home and never get lost again.

programme.title: Something Special: Were All Friends
programme.desc: Theres make-believe fun for Justin and his friend as they pretend to run a pizza restaurant. Meanwhile, Mr Tumble is knitting a fancy new jumper to wear for his pretend fashion show.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies hear a `honk honk in the distance and the Tubby Car approaches. The Tubby Car drives the Teletubbies across Teletubbyland as they sing the Tubby Car song.

programme.title: Andys Safari Adventures
programme.sub-title: Andy and the Naked Mole Rat
programme.desc: Andy jets off to the Sahara Desert, in Africa, in search of a naked mole rat.

programme.title: Waffle the Wonder Dog
programme.desc: When Jess takes Evie for her first school visit, Waffle goes along too, on the condition that he doesnt sing. He tries his best to behave, but its hard for a Wonder Dog! On their walk to school, Jess and Evie bump into Connie Lester and her daughter Ruby. Ruby reveals that she will also be starting at Sommersby School too, in the year above Evie. Ruby enjoys stroking Waffle and tells Evie that she loves animals. She has a pet dog of her own, Jelly, a yellow labrador.

programme.title: Molly and Mack
programme.desc: Molly examines her shelf of special things at the back of Macks stall. She chooses the tinkly bell and remembers the day she got it. Alice has organised a relaxation class but is worried that no-one will come. Molly tries to persuade all the people at the Hub to come to the class. Mack, Daisy, James and the kids join the class, but Moira says she has lots of jobs to do before a council inspection later that day.

programme.title: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Raa Raa is keen to try fishing with Crocky, but keeps scaring the fish away every time he makes a noise. Crocky and the others come up with a very special fishing trip for Raa Raa.

programme.title: The Game Catchers
programme.desc: The Game Catchers land on a planet with a very thin atmosphere that makes them feel very light, allowing them to make great leaps.

programme.title: Octonauts
programme.desc: As Tweak tests the Gup-X deep down in the Midnight Zone, a yeti crab damages the ship, endangering itself and the Octonauts.

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.sub-title: The Tale of the One That Got Away
programme.desc: When Peter and friends encounter the legendary Jack Sharp, a large trout that even Peters father failed to catch, they try to reel the fish in once and for all. However, catching a fish is a lot harder than it looks and besides, what do you do with a big, bad trout once youve caught it?

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: The Squirrels help Duggee try out his new outdoor pizza oven. Duggee makes the bases, then the Squirrels each put on all the toppings they like best. Some of their combinations are... interesting.

programme.title: Vida the Vet
programme.desc: Its Healthy Fur Day, and almost all the animals in Sweetwood are coming to Vidas clinic to get groomed. However, Zigzag, a bunny with some serious knots in her fluffy tail, is an exception.

programme.title: Supertato
programme.desc: Supertato tells his side of how he and Evil Pea first met when they were young veggies.

programme.title: Big Lizard
programme.desc: Big Lizard isnt happy in his skin! Cosima tries everything to stop him scratching until she realises thats exactly what he needs to do. Hes shedding his skin!

programme.title: Mojo Swoptops
programme.desc: Bo is tired and falls asleep in the middle of hunting for Fabios lost inflatable fruit. Its up to Mojo to finish the job - without waking up poor, exhausted Bo!

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Bluey and Bingo love to video chat with Muffin and Socks so they can all draw pictures together. When Muffin wont give Socks a turn, the kids discover what happens when they hog.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: While Dad and his mates pull out some tree stumps in the garden, Bluey, Bingo and Muffin turn one stump into a nail salon. When it comes time to pull out the girls stump, Dad must strike a deal.

programme.title: Piripenguins
programme.desc: When the Emperor Penguin visits the berg, he discovers Pancake is a long-lost Prince. Pancake learns how to act royal, but all the attention goes to his head.

programme.title: Dodges Pup School
programme.desc: An unexpected visitor has arrived in the playground, a cat. The pups are initially scared, after all theyve heard that cats have lasers for eyes. But Dodge decides to be brave and go and talk to it.

programme.title: Waffle the Wonder Dog
programme.desc: Simon is taking Jess out for a birthday dinner, so Gramps is on babysitting duty. Hes brought along Mr Willows dogs, Trevor and Violet, for the evening. programme.title: Puffin Rock
programme.desc: Marvin misplaces his favourite rock, and when no substitute will suffice, Oona assists him in retrieving the original from the seagulls.

programme.title: Bros

programme.title: Car S.O.S

programme.title: Come Dine with Me

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Second to host in Edinburgh is Alison Lynch, whos still reeling from last nights dinner party and plans a jiujitsu-themed surprise for her entertainment, meanwhile, Rena appears to be winning over the group.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Beautician Cynthia Gentle plans to win over her guests in Edinburgh with an international themed menu, including crocodile as part of the main course. She also has a dress code of 1950s glamour.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: In Edinburgh, healthcare worker Rena is planning a decadent menu. However, its Cynthia who raises eyebrows when she brings out one of Renas bedroom toys out at the table. The raucous atmosphere seems to be all too much for poor Peter though.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Security boss Gary Reid is rigging his dining room in Edinburgh with spy equipment ensuring that his guests every whims are catered for. Alison and Peter continue to bicker and finally things come to a head.

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: Sam realises how much he misses his former sports celebrity status when a local newscaster asks to interview him again.

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: Coachs likeable daughter Lisa stops by Cheers to introduce her fiance, the slick, unscrupulous Roy, who treats her shabbily and offends everyone.

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: Diane becomes upset when Sam hits on an old friend of hers whos on the rebound from an unhappy love affair.

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: Norm tries to make points with the boss by planning the annual office party at Cheers and arranging for Diane to be the old mans `date.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Ray and Robert get into tricky territory over who will have responsibility for Marie in the future.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Frank and Marie announce they are moving into a retirement home and sell their house to Robert and Amy.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Ray and Debra discover that Frank and Marie are going to be thrown out of their apartment.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: After returning from a tropical vacation, Frasier is visited by the former loves of his life and must make an important decision. Meanwhile, Roz is hounded by Lanas frisky teenage son.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Not sure whether to end his relationship with his current girlfriend Claire after having romantic dreams about Lana, Frasier is plagued by the unwanted advice of his exes, Lilith and Diane.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Daphne feels threatened when Niles begins counselling an attractive female patient, and a cricket gets on Frasiers nerves.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Friendships are tested when Carl skips town with $200,000, winnings from a lottery ticket he bought with Homer, Moe and Lenny.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: A trendy new pastor asks Homer to be a church deacon, but when Homer starts to get a little too fervent, Bart asks Flanders for help finding their former pastor.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Marge books Bart in for piano lessons, and a distraught Homer becomes completely bald.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Manuel and his son Marvyn are joining forces to find the perfect holiday home in Alicante on a budget of £130k, for their whole family to enjoy. Can Leah Charles-King deliver the dream?

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Antoinette and Carmen welcome their rivals to the Seacrest Hotel in Portsmouth, where the dazzling decor, a super nights sleep and an egg-cellent breakfast impress their guests.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Best mates Glenn and Leon host at The White Horse Hotel in Storrington in West Sussex. There are hair-raising concerns and damp discoveries, and for some guests its too close for comfort.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Husband and wife Mike and Del give their guests a real taste of Wales at Deri-Down Guest House in Abergavenny. But bed blunders and a pre-order brekkie leave some of them wanting more.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Mother and son Margaret and Fraser host at Royle Farm BandB in Burton-on-Trent in Staffordshire, where some guests fixate on the fantastical furniture and others feel askew about the view.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Its the final day and the BandBers meet for one last time to settle some scores. After bedtime blues and follicle findings are aired, the payments are revealed and the winner is announced.

programme.title: George Clarkes Amazing Spaces
programme.desc: George meets a couple turning a water pumping station into a luxury holiday home and an outdoor swimmer building a futurist micro camper. Plus: a glamping pod in a Danish forest.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off

programme.title: Channel 4 News
programme.desc: Includes sport and weather.

programme.title: The Equalizer
programme.desc: A former commando who had faked his own death comes out of retirement to rescue a young girl from violent Russian mobsters.

programme.title: Widows

programme.title: Formula 1

programme.title: Ramsays Hotel Hell
programme.desc: Gordon visits West Dover in Vermont to try to save a dog-friendly hotel thats desperately in need of help. Sandy MacDougall, the owner, runs the Four Seasons Inn.

programme.title: Gold Rush
programme.desc: The boys are back in Alaska (although Discovery dropped the states mention in the title after the first season) hoping to strike it rich mining for gold. Their first effort was anything but rich and glorious, however, as the crew led by Todd Hoffman and his father, Jack, sunk $250,000 into their dream and came away with just $20,000 worth of gold. The dismal summer was filled with injuries, malfunctioning equipment and constant fighting among the greenhorn miners, yet their serious case of gold fever trumps any talk of giving up and leads to a new operating plan in order to salvage their dream. The series also keeps tabs on the efforts of teenager Parker Schnabel and old-timer Dakota Fred to hit the mother lode at separate sites.

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummond cooks up some delicious ideas for a barbecue feast using a Grilled Pineapple Pepper Relish to top both her Sticky BBQ Glazed Pork Tenderloin and Baked Cheese. She prepares Rees Eat Your Greens Salad and a party-worthy Frozen Sangria.

programme.title: Tom Kerridges America

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.desc: In the third series, the search for Britains best amateur baker is back as 12 passionate baking fans compete for the title. Mel Giedroyc and Sue Perkins return as presenters, as do judges Mary Berry and Paul Hollywood, who devise the three challenges faced by the competitors each week. They incorporate a signature bake, which tests the bakers personality and creative flair; a technical bake, which tests experience; and a showstopper bake, during which the bakers are able to showcase their depth of skill and talent. Berry and Hollywood inspect, prod and sample the baked goodies as they decide who gets to have their cake - and eat it.

programme.title: Nigel Slaters Simple Suppers
programme.desc: Nigel Slater transforms favourite classic recipes by giving them a new twist. Whether it is a makeover for the traditional cottage pie, or an exciting new version of the time-honoured apple tart, Nigel proves that just by taking the basic principles and altering them slightly, it is easy to jazz up some of Britains most-loved dishes. Nigel also gives a new spin to beans on toast.

programme.title: Nigel Slaters Simple Suppers
programme.desc: Nigel Slater demonstrates how to make ingredients go just that little bit further. Whether its adding grated beetroot to make a tasty meatball supper feed the masses, or putting the spotlight on a small garden harvest to make a sensuous pudding, Nigels clever tricks and inspired ideas show that you can often make bountiful feasts with apparently few ingredients.

James takes part in an unusual contest, hen racing, where he challenges a local lad and world champion to a race. After discovering some award-winning gin, James meets a local forager and samples some of his elderflower wine.

programme.desc: Music box expert Stephen Kember and furniture restorer Will Kirk collaborate on the repair of a small musical table of great sentimental value to owner Jenny. programme.title: The Repair Shop
programme.desc: Resident clock maker Steve Fletcher tackles a pocket watch that has come all the way from Holland and which spent four years in a World War II Japanese internment camp undetected while secretly sewn in to the hem of a dress. programme.title: The Repair Shop

programme.desc: Garan is part of a group of international hitmen who are contracted to take out the most dangerous killer in the world, only to find out that theyre the ones being hunted.

Lively action fantasy based on the cult comic book.

programme.desc: Johnny Blaze gets a chance to rid himself of the Ghost Rider curse forever when members of a secret church hire him to save a boy from Satan.

programme.desc: Scientists, soldiers and adventurers encounter the mighty Kong and other monstrous creatures after travelling to an uncharted island in the Pacific Ocean.

programme.title: The Fall Guy
programme.desc: Battle-scarred stuntman Colt Seavers springs back into action when a movie star suddenly disappears. As the mystery deepens, he soon finds himself ensnared in a sinister plot that pushes him to the edge of a fall more dangerous than any stunt.

programme.title: American Sniper
programme.desc: Based on the autobiography by Chris Kyle.

programme.title: The Green Hornet
programme.desc: The heir to a newspaper fortune joins forces with a resourceful company employee to try to bring a powerful Los Angeles crime lord to justice.

programme.title: Superman Returns
programme.desc: The Man of Steel returns to Earth after a five-year absence to find Lex Luthor ready to take over the world, and Lois Lane shacked up with a new man and a kid. The people have lost faith in their former saviour. Can Superman save their lives and regain their trust?

programme.title: Crank
programme.desc: An ex-hit man is injected with a mysterious cocktail of drugs by his arch-rival that will kill him if his heart rate drops below a certain level. Hurtling through a succession of sex and violence in order to keep his pulse rate up, he must seek revenge and keep himself and his girlfriend alive.

programme.title: Crank
programme.desc: An ex-hit man is injected with a mysterious cocktail of drugs by his arch-rival that will kill him if his heart rate drops below a certain level. Hurtling through a succession of sex and violence in order to keep his pulse rate up, he must seek revenge and keep himself and his girlfriend alive.

programme.title: Enter the Dragon
programme.desc: A kung fu expert is assigned to penetrate an island fortress to destroy an opium and white slavery empire.

programme.title: Long Gone Heroes
programme.desc: Gunner is a special forces soldier who returns to the field of battle to save his kidnapped niece in South America. He and his team soon discover that her disappearance is part of a corrupt private operation that hits way too close to home.

programme.title: King of Killers
programme.desc: Garan is part of a group of international hitmen who are contracted to take out the most dangerous killer in the world, only to find out that theyre the ones being hunted.

programme.title: Hellboy
programme.desc: Though the Nazis fail to open the gates of Hell, one little devil gets through. Raised at a secret FBI lab, Hellboy is a cigar-chomping, crimson demon with a breezeblock for a right hand and a gift for fighting otherworldly beasts. Lively action fantasy based on the cult comic book.

programme.title: Vendetta
programme.desc: When his daughter is brutally murdered and legal justice looks unlikely, William Duncan takes the law into his own hands, setting out on a quest for retribution.

programme.title: Ghost Rider: Spirit of Vengeance
programme.desc: Johnny Blaze gets a chance to rid himself of the Ghost Rider curse forever when members of a secret church hire him to save a boy from Satan.

programme.title: Robin Hood: Prince of Thieves
programme.desc: On his return from the Crusades, Robin of Locksley learns that his father has been murdered by the tyrannical Sheriff of Nottingham and embarks on a campaign of guerrilla warfare to protect King Richards throne. Fight scenes are lively and inventive, and a set piece fought under the forest canopy pulls out all the stops.

programme.title: Kong: Skull Island
programme.desc: Scientists, soldiers and adventurers encounter the mighty Kong and other monstrous creatures after travelling to an uncharted island in the Pacific Ocean.

programme.title: The Fall Guy
programme.desc: Battle-scarred stuntman Colt Seavers springs back into action when a movie star suddenly disappears. As the mystery deepens, he soon finds himself ensnared in a sinister plot that pushes him to the edge of a fall more dangerous than any stunt.

programme.title: American Sniper
programme.desc: Based on the autobiography by Chris Kyle.

programme.title: The Green Hornet
programme.desc: The heir to a newspaper fortune joins forces with a resourceful company employee to try to bring a powerful Los Angeles crime lord to justice.

programme.title: Superman Returns

programme.title: Crank
programme.desc: An ex-hit man is injected with a mysterious cocktail of drugs by his arch-rival that will kill him if his heart rate drops below a certain level. Hurtling through a succession of sex and violence in order to keep his pulse rate up, he must seek revenge and keep himself and his girlfriend alive.

programme.title: Sinbad: Legend of the Seven Seas
programme.desc: The brave mariner Sinbad battles raging elements, mutinous dogs and fearsome monsters to retrieve the Book of Peace after being framed by the treacherous Goddess of Chaos. A DreamWorks animation.

programme.title: Spirit: Stallion of the Cimarron
programme.desc: The story of a wild mustang stallion captured by horse traders and sold to a cavalry regiment at a frontier outpost, where a cruel colonel attempts to break the free-spirited horse. However, he escapes in the company of a Native American youth and embarks upon a series of adventures in the harsh and unforgiving times of the Old West.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda
programme.desc: Po might just be the laziest, clumsiest panda in the Valley of Peace, but he secretly dreams of becoming a kung fu legend. When the villainous snow leopard Tai Lung threatens Pos homeland, the hapless panda is chosen to fulfil an ancient prophecy and defend the Valley from attack. Training under Master Shifu, Po embarks on an epic high-kicking adventure as he sets out to thwart Tai Lungs evil plans. A DreamWorks animation.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 2
programme.desc: Po must unlock secrets of his past in order to defeat a formidable villain who plans to wipe out kung fu and conquer China. A DreamWorks animation.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 3
programme.desc: After reuniting with his long-lost father, Po must train a village of clumsy pandas to help him defeat a supernatural warrior who becomes stronger with each battle.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 4
programme.desc: When a powerful shape-shifting sorceress sets her eyes on Pos Staff of Wisdom, he suddenly realises hes going to need some help. Teaming up with a quick-witted corsac fox, he soon discovers that heroes can be found in the most unexpected places.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Saturday Night
programme.desc: To celebrate the release of the film Saturday Night, join the Cinema List as we explore 50 years of hilarious films from the SNL cast - including Waynes World, Bridesmaids and more.

programme.title: The Men Who Stare at Goats
programme.desc: A reporter in Iraq may just have the story of a lifetime when he meets Lyn Cassady, a guy who claims to be a former member of the US Armys New Earth Army, a unit that employs paranormal powers in their missions.

programme.title: Click
programme.desc: A workaholic father finds that there are not enough hours in the day to balance his job and home life, until he discovers a remote control that can pause and rewind time. However, when it malfunctions, chaos ensues, and the man realises that he has lost control of his life.

programme.title: The Blues Brothers
programme.desc: The story of a pair of blues musicians who try to raise the money to save an orphanage by reuniting their old band - nearly writing off Chicago in the process.

programme.title: Mr. Deeds
programme.desc: Deeds is much-loved in his small town, but following the death of a long-lost uncle, who also happens to be a billionaire tycoon, Deeds inherits a fortune and heads for the big city to run his uncles company. When a media frenzy ensues surrounding Deeds inheritance, reporter Babe Bennett goes undercover to out Deeds as the small-town fool she thinks he is.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: Nick, Dale and Kurt all despise their bosses, but who would be crazy enough to quit their jobs in such poor economic times? The trio drunkenly and hypothetically discuss how to kill their bosses, and before they know it, theyve hired a murder consultant to help them pull off the three deeds.

programme.title: A Night at the Roxbury
programme.desc: Two sorry siblings dance their way through the Los Angeles club scene while trying to open up their own establishment.

programme.title: The Holdovers
programme.desc: Forced to spend Christmas break with a handful of students, a curmudgeonly instructor at a New England prep school develops an unlikely bond with a brainy troublemaker and the head cook.

programme.title: Beetlejuice Beetlejuice
programme.desc: Still haunted by Beetlejuice, Lydias life gets turned upside down when her daughter discovers a portal to the afterlife. When someone says Beetlejuices name three times, the mischievous demon soon returns to unleash his very own brand of mayhem.

programme.title: Daddys Home 2
programme.desc: Brad and Dustys respective fathers show up to turn Christmastime upside down.

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
programme.desc: Scott Pilgrim plays bass guitar in a struggling Toronto-based band and pines after his ex-girlfriend, now a success in her own band. At a party he meets Ramona Flowers and instantly is smitten, but in his pursuit of her he is attacked by Matthew Patel who informs Scott that he is the first of seven evil exes that Scott will have to defeat in order to win Ramona.

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: The continuing adventures of the Portokalos family. A follow-up to the 2002 comedy, My Big Fat Greek Wedding.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: When a criminal plot endangers the beach, Mitch Buchannon leads his elite squad of lifeguards on a mission to prove that one doesnt need to wear a badge to save the bay.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Saturday Night
programme.desc: To celebrate the release of the film Saturday Night, join the Cinema List as we explore 50 years of hilarious films from the SNL cast - including Waynes World, Bridesmaids and more.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Saturday Night
programme.desc: To celebrate the release of the film Saturday Night, join the Cinema List as we explore 50 years of hilarious films from the SNL cast - including Waynes World, Bridesmaids and more.

programme.title: Problemista
programme.desc: Alejandro is an aspiring toy designer whos struggling to bring his unusual ideas to life in New York City. As time on his work visa runs out, a job assisting an art world outcast becomes his only hope to stay in the country and realise his dream.

programme.title: Breakfast at Tiffanys
programme.desc: Blake Edwards bittersweet tale about the seemingly air-headed elegant socialite Holly Golightly whose façade hides pain and loss, and Paul Varjak, a blocked writer with his own dark secrets who falls for her. As their Manhattan-based romance progresses, one of them will end up heartbroken.

programme.title: The Danish Girl
programme.desc: Artist Einar Wegener travels to Germany to undergo one of the first sex-change operations that took place over the course of 2 years.

programme.title: Dallas Buyers Club
programme.desc: Learning that he has AIDS, Ron Woodroof smuggles medicine into the United States to fight the disease.

programme.title: P.S. I Love You
programme.desc: New York widow Holly is devastated by her husbands sudden demise, but messages he left behind offer a ray of hope.

programme.title: It Ends With Us
programme.desc: Lily Bloom falls for a charming neurosurgeon after she moves to Boston to chase her dream of opening her own business. However, when her first love suddenly reenters her life, her relationship gets upended, leaving her with an impossible choice.

programme.title: The Blind Side
programme.desc: Michael Oher is a poor and undereducated African-American teenager who lived all his life on the streets. His tremendous size and quickness makes him a perfect athlete and attracts the interest if a wealthy and conservative suburban family who take him in and groom him both athletically and academically.

programme.title: Bob Marley: One Love
programme.desc: Jamaican singer-songwriter Bob Marley overcomes adversity to become the most famous reggae musician in the world.

programme.title: The Bodyguard
programme.desc: A Secret Service agent-turned-bodyguard finds danger and romance while protecting an entertainer from a stalker.

programme.title: Fifty Shades Freed
programme.desc: Believing theyve left behind the shadowy figures from the past, billionaire Christian Grey and his new wife, Anastasia, fully embrace their inextricable connection and shared life of luxury. But just as the Greys begin to step into their new roles, sinister events come to light and jeopardise their happy ending before it even begins.

programme.title: Dreamgirls
programme.desc: Following the adventures of The Dreamettes, an all-girl singing group. Theyre going nowhere fast until they meet fast-talking car salesman-come-manager who has ambitions to make a fortune selling black music to a white audience. He persuades them to become backing singers for James `Thunder Early, but the larger-than-life lead singer Effie White must step out of the spotlight in favour of the more image-friendly Deena Jones.

programme.title: There Will Be Blood
programme.desc: Ruthless silver miner, turned oil prospector, Daniel Plainview moves to oil-rich California. Using his adopted son HW to project a trustworthy, family-man image, Plainview cons local landowners into selling him their valuable properties for a pittance. However, local preacher Eli Sunday suspects Plainviews motives and intentions, starting a slow-burning feud that threatens both their lives.

Using his adopted son HW to project a trustworthy, family-man image, Plainview cons local landowners into selling him their valuable properties for a pittance. However, local preacher Eli Sunday suspects Plainviews motives and intentions, starting a slow-burning feud that threatens both their lives.

programme.title: Big Fat Liar
programme.desc: A junior high-school student and his best friend play a series of pranks on the sleazy Hollywood producer responsible for plagiarising his class essay and turning it into a hit film.

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: Professor Sherman, a 450lb scientist, falls for his new colleague Professor Carla Purty, but out on a date, hes humiliated by a nightclub comedian about his weight. Upset and depressed, he takes a potion hes only tested previously on hamsters and - hey presto - he turns into a svelte and cool-talking babe-magnet, Buddy Love.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Magical Movies
programme.desc: From Harry Potter to Fantastic Beasts, Ella Enchanted to The Secret Garden. Discover a collection of magical journeys where destiny and wonder collide.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Philosophers Stone
programme.desc: Big-screen adaptation of the best-selling novel by JK Rowling about an 11-year-old boy living with his cruel aunt and uncle who learns that he is the orphaned son of powerful wizards. Harry is offered a place at Hogwarts, a prestigious boarding school for wizards, where he begins piecing together the mystery of his parents deaths with the help of his new-found friends.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
programme.desc: The second instalment of boy wizard Harry Potters adventures at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, based on the novel by JK Rowling. A mysterious elf tells Harry to expect trouble during his second year at Hogwarts, but nothing can prepare him for trees that fight back, flying cars, spiders that talk and deadly warnings written in blood on the walls of the school.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
programme.desc: Harry, Hermione and Ron return for a third year at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, but the school is under lockdown as notorious murderer Sirius Black has escaped from the jail of Azkaban and apparently has a score to settle with Harry. Hermione has a trick up her sleeve for getting to all her classes on time, which comes in handy in solving the latest mystery for the magical students.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
programme.desc: Harry is mysteriously selected to compete in the prestigious Triwizard Tournament, a thrilling competition that pits him against more experienced students from Hogwarts and two rival wizarding schools. Meanwhile, supporters of the evil Lord Voldemort send a shockwave of fear throughout the wizard community when their Dark Mark scorches the sky at the Quidditch World Cup, signalling a return to power.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
programme.desc: Harry is dismayed when the Ministry of Magic denies Voldemorts return and appoints a nasty new teacher at Hogwarts to keep an eye on Dumbledore. The new teachers constant meddling with the curriculum convinces the students that school cannot prepare them for the battle ahead, so they form a secret duelling club with Harry as their tutor.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
programme.desc: Harry and the gang confront the terrifying truth that Lord Voldemort is back and Hogwarts is in danger.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1
programme.desc: Following Dumbledores death, Lord Voldemort and his cronies have taken over the Ministry of Magic and are hellbent on killing Harry Potter. As a result, the good wizards of the Order of the Phoenix arrive at Harrys home and whisk him to safety, but the Death Eaters are hot on his trail. Harry, Hermione and Ron set out on a epic quest to destroy all the locate and destroy all the horcruxes.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
programme.desc: Harry, Ron and Hermione have escaped Bellatrix Lestranges clutches, but their getaway has come at a price. Dobby has been killed, meanwhile Lord Voldemort has acquired the highly powerful Elder Wand from Dumbledores tomb. Still on a quest to destroy the Horcruxes that hold the pieces of Voldemorts soul, Harry breaks into Bellatrix vault, where he finds a Horcrux.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Philosophers Stone
programme.desc: Big-screen adaptation of the best-selling novel by JK Rowling about an 11-year-old boy living with his cruel aunt and uncle who learns that he is the orphaned son of powerful wizards. Harry is offered a place at Hogwarts, a prestigious boarding school for wizards, where he begins piecing together the mystery of his parents deaths with the help of his new-found friends.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Philosophers Stone
programme.desc: Big-screen adaptation of the best-selling novel by JK Rowling about an 11-year-old boy living with his cruel aunt and uncle who learns that he is the orphaned son of powerful wizards. Harry is offered a place at Hogwarts, a prestigious boarding school for wizards, where he begins piecing together the mystery of his parents deaths with the help of his new-found friends.

programme.title: Big Fat Liar
programme.desc: A junior high-school student and his best friend play a series of pranks on the sleazy Hollywood producer responsible for plagiarising his class essay and turning it into a hit film.

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: Professor Sherman, a 450lb scientist, falls for his new colleague Professor Carla Purty, but out on a date, hes humiliated by a nightclub comedian about his weight. Upset and depressed, he takes a potion hes only tested previously on hamsters and - hey presto - he turns into a svelte and cool-talking babe-magnet, Buddy Love.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Magical Movies
programme.desc: From Harry Potter to Fantastic Beasts, Ella Enchanted to The Secret Garden. Discover a collection of magical journeys where destiny and wonder collide.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Philosophers Stone
programme.desc: Big-screen adaptation of the best-selling novel by JK Rowling about an 11-year-old boy living with his cruel aunt and uncle who learns that he is the orphaned son of powerful wizards. Harry is offered a place at Hogwarts, a prestigious boarding school for wizards, where he begins piecing together the mystery of his parents deaths with the help of his new-found friends.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
programme.desc: The second instalment of boy wizard Harry Potters adventures at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, based on the novel by JK Rowling. A mysterious elf tells Harry to expect trouble during his second year at Hogwarts, but nothing can prepare him for trees that fight back, flying cars, spiders that talk and deadly warnings written in blood on the walls of the school.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
programme.desc: Harry, Hermione and Ron return for a third year at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, but the school is under lockdown as notorious murderer Sirius Black has escaped from the jail of Azkaban and apparently has a score to settle with Harry. Hermione has a trick up her sleeve for getting to all her classes on time, which comes in handy in solving the latest mystery for the magical students.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
programme.desc: Harry is mysteriously selected to compete in the prestigious Triwizard Tournament, a thrilling competition that pits him against more experienced students from Hogwarts and two rival wizarding schools. Meanwhile, supporters of the evil Lord Voldemort send a shockwave of fear throughout the wizard community when their Dark Mark scorches the sky at the Quidditch World Cup, signalling a return to power.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
programme.desc: Harry is dismayed when the Ministry of Magic denies Voldemorts return and appoints a nasty new teacher at Hogwarts to keep an eye on Dumbledore. The new teachers constant meddling with the curriculum convinces the students that school cannot prepare them for the battle ahead, so they form a secret duelling club with Harry as their tutor.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
programme.desc: Harry and the gang confront the terrifying truth that Lord Voldemort is back and Hogwarts is in danger.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1
programme.desc: Following Dumbledores death, Lord Voldemort and his cronies have taken over the Ministry of Magic and are hellbent on killing Harry Potter. As a result, the good wizards of the Order of the Phoenix arrive at Harrys home and whisk him to safety, but the Death Eaters are hot on his trail. Harry, Hermione and Ron set out on a epic quest to destroy all the locate and destroy all the horcruxes.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
programme.desc: Harry, Ron and Hermione have escaped Bellatrix Lestranges clutches, but their getaway has come at a price. Dobby has been killed, meanwhile Lord Voldemort has acquired the highly powerful Elder Wand from Dumbledores tomb. Still on a quest to destroy the Horcruxes that hold the pieces of Voldemorts soul, Harry breaks into Bellatrix vault, where he finds a Horcrux.

Harry is offered a place at Hogwarts, a prestigious boarding school for wizards, where he begins piecing together the mystery of his parents deaths with the help of his new-found friends.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Philosophers Stone
programme.desc: Big-screen adaptation of the best-selling novel by JK Rowling about an 11-year-old boy living with his cruel aunt and uncle who learns that he is the orphaned son of powerful wizards. Harry is offered a place at Hogwarts, a prestigious boarding school for wizards, where he begins piecing together the mystery of his parents deaths with the help of his new-found friends.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Twins
programme.desc: Two very different twin brothers were born as a result of a genetic experiment. Following their birth, the flawless Julius grew up on a paradise island, while the less-than-perfect Vincent was sent to an orphanage. Now, many years later, Vincent is a thief and con man with huge debts. What will Julius think when he searches for his long-lost twin and finds him in jail?

programme.title: Brewsters Millions
programme.desc: Montgomery Brewster is a low-league baseball player who suddenly finds out that a distant relative has left him $300 million. However, theres a catch: he has to waste $30 million in just 30 days without anyone knowing hes doing it.

programme.title: Small Soldiers
programme.desc: A toy company develops action-figure soldiers whose realistic fighting capabilities cause mayhem for a toy-shop owner and his family. Unaware of their military prowess, the shop keeper takes delivery of the soldiers, who break free from their packaging to attack their Gorgonite enemies. When the Gorgonites communicate with the shop keepers son, the humans find themselves under siege.

programme.title: Dads Army
programme.desc: In 1940, with a German invasion looming, the defence of Walmington-on-Sea is in the hands of local bank manager Captain Mainwaring and a motley collection of volunteers. After a series of blunders, the Home Guard finally get the glory they deserve.

programme.title: Singin in the Rain
programme.desc: When the transition is being made from silent films to `talkies, everyone has trouble adapting. Don and Lina have been cast repeatedly as a romantic couple, but when their latest film is remade into a musical, only Don has the voice for the new singing part. After a lot of practise with a diction coach, Lina still sounds terrible, and Kathy, a bright young aspiring actress, is hired to record over her voice.

programme.title: Grease
programme.desc: High-spirited musical set in 1950s America, in which a girl and boy who met on the beach are unexpectedly reunited at high school. She cannot understand how different he has become. Can the leather-clad, tough-talking leader of the T-Birds really be the same person? Perhaps her new friends, the Pink Ladies, can help her win back his heart?

programme.title: Do the Right Thing
programme.desc: Its the hottest day of the year and when Italian-American Sal refuses to make changes to his pizza parlour in the predominantly black community, tension and tempers mount.

programme.title: Birdy
programme.desc: A soldier returns from Vietnam to find his boyhood friend, also a fellow soldier, in a military hospital, having suffered a mental breakdown in which he has become detached from reality and imagines that he is a bird.

programme.title: Scent of a Woman
programme.desc: Frank is a retired Lt Col in the US army. Hes blind and impossible to get along with. Charlie is at school and is looking forward to going to university; to help pay for a trip home for Christmas, he agrees to look after Frank over thanksgiving. Franks niece says this will be easy money, but she didnt reckon on Frank spending his Thanksgiving in New York.

programme.title: Taxi Driver
programme.desc: New York City cab driver Travis Bickle constantly reflects on the ugly corruption of life around him, and becomes increasingly disturbed over his own loneliness and alienation. In nearly every phase of his life, Bickle remains a complete outsider, failing to make emotional contact with anyone. Unable to sleep night after night, Travis haunts the local pornography emporiums to find diversion.

programme.title: Midnight Express
programme.desc: Based on the true story of an American who endured the horrors of a Turkish prison after his arrest on drug charges.

programme.title: Fatal Attraction
programme.desc: A glamorous career woman loses control when her married lover, a Manhattan attorney, ends their brief affair. Unable to accept his rejection, she pursues him at the office, and then at his home, eventually drawing his wife and daughter into the confrontation.

programme.title: Superman Returns
programme.desc: The Man of Steel returns to Earth after a five-year absence to find Lex Luthor ready to take over the world, and Lois Lane shacked up with a new man and a kid. The people have lost faith in their former saviour. Can Superman save their lives and regain their trust?

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Dragon Rider
programme.desc: A dragon, an orphaned boy, and a mountain spirit work together as they trek through the Himalayas in search for the Rim of Heaven.

programme.title: Monster Family
programme.desc: Draculas spell turns a woman and her loved ones into a vampire, a mummy, a werewolf and Frankensteins monster.

programme.title: Dog Man
programme.desc: A life-saving surgery fuses together a police officer and his faithful police dog -- and Dog Man is born. Learning to embrace his new identity, Dog Man must stop feline supervillain Petey the Cat from cloning himself and going on a crime spree.

programme.title: The Wiz
programme.desc: In this version of the classic story - based on the smash Broadway musical - Dorothy is a shy 24-year-old Harlem kindergarten teacher who is brought by a snowstorm to the mysterious Land of Oz, a sprawling, decaying, nightmarish, and dangerous megalopolis that resembles the physical characteristics of New York City.

programme.title: Wicked
programme.desc: An unlikely friendship emerges between Elphaba and Glinda, two clashing witches in the magical land of Oz. Elphaba is wrongfully cast as a wicked witch as she seeks to expose the fraudulent, corrupt Wizard who rules the land.

programme.title: Dog Man
programme.desc: A life-saving surgery fuses together a police officer and his faithful police dog -- and Dog Man is born. Learning to embrace his new identity, Dog Man must stop feline supervillain Petey the Cat from cloning himself and going on a crime spree.

programme.title: Stardust
programme.desc: In a countryside town bordering on a magical land, a young man ventures into the realm of fairies to retrieve a fallen star in order to win the heart of his beloved.

programme.title: Wicked
programme.desc: An unlikely friendship emerges between Elphaba and Glinda, two clashing witches in the magical land of Oz. Elphaba is wrongfully cast as a wicked witch as she seeks to expose the fraudulent, corrupt Wizard who rules the land.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania
programme.desc: Dracula, who operates a high-end resort away from the human world, goes into overprotective mode when a boy discovers the resort and falls for the counts teen-aged daughter.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 2
programme.desc: Concerned that his half-human grandson isnt showing his vampire side, Dracula and his friends put the boy through a `monster-in-training boot camp just as Dracs old-school father decides to pay a visit.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 3: A Monster Vacation
programme.desc: Mavis surprises Dracula with plans for a fun-filled summer voyage on a monster cruise. As the pack starts enjoying colossal buffets and exotic excursions, Drac finds himself falling for the ships intriguing but dangerous captain. He soon learns that trying to balance family, friends and romance might just be too much to handle. even for the worlds most powerful vampire.

programme.title: The Canterville Ghost
programme.desc: Sir Simon de Canterville has been haunting the grounds of his country estate for more than 300 years, but he soon meets his match when he tries to scare off a modern-day American family that just moved in.

programme.title: Repo Men
programme.desc: Its the year 2025 and an enormous corporation known as The Union has revolutionised the medical world by creating artificial human organs. The only problem is that those benefiting from transplants find themselves heavily in dept with the ruthless company and if the steep bills arent paid so-called repo men are sent in to collect.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Timestalker
programme.desc: Hapless Agnes repeatedly falls for the wrong guy, dies a grim death, and is reincarnated a century later. As she experiences romantic misfortune through different eras of history, Agnes seeks to avoid repeat mistakes and finally break the cycle.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Cinema List: Horror Villians

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Chappie
programme.desc: Outside influences affect the way the worlds first thinking, feeling robot lives and behaves.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Omni Loop
programme.desc: A quantum physicist finds herself stuck in a time loop with a black hole growing in her chest and only a week to live. When she meets a gifted student they team up to save her life and unlock the mysteries of time travel.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Gravity

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Voyagers
programme.desc: Set in the near future, the film chronicles the odyssey of 30 young men and women who are sent deep into space on a multi-generational mission in search of a new home. The mission descends into madness, as the crew reverts to its most primal state, not knowing if the real threat they face is whats outside the ship or who theyre becoming inside it.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Passengers
programme.desc: Awakened from their hibernation pods 90 years early, two space travellers enjoy the pleasures of a budding romance until they discover that their ship is in imminent danger.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Children of Men
programme.desc: In England 2027, worldwide infertility has left the population on the brink of extinction and all hope of a cure is lost. However, underground activist Julian shows up with a miraculously pregnant girl.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Congo

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: I Am Legend
programme.desc: In the year 2012, scientists engineer a cure for cancer. He has two aims: find a cure for the virus and make contact with other survivors.
