programme.title: Ma
programme.desc: A lonely middle-aged woman befriends some teenagers and decides to let them party at her house. Just when the kids think their luck couldnt get any better, things start happening that make them question the intention of their host.

programme.title: Tarot
programme.desc: Friends unwittingly unleash an unspeakable evil trapped within a cursed deck of tarot cards. One by one, they come face to face with fate, racing against death to escape the future foretold in their readings.

programme.title: Sick
programme.desc: While quarantining at her familys lake house during the pandemic, Parker and her best friend are threatened by an unexpected visitor.

programme.title: Lovely, Dark, and Deep
programme.desc: A new back-country ranger travels alone through the dangerous wilderness, hoping to uncover the origins of a tragedy that has haunted her since she was a child.

programme.title: Ma
programme.desc: A lonely middle-aged woman befriends some teenagers and decides to let them party at her house. Just when the kids think their luck couldnt get any better, things start happening that make them question the intention of their host.

programme.title: Annabelle
programme.desc: A possessed doll that was purchased for their new born child creates havoc, and destroys a young couples lives.

programme.title: Cuckoo
programme.desc: Seventeen-year-old Gretchen reluctantly leaves America to live with her father at a resort in the German Alps. Plagued by strange noises and bloody visions, she soon discovers a shocking secret that concerns her own family.

programme.title: Friday the 13th - Part III
programme.desc: Jason is still on the loose. While the hunt for him continues, another group of teenagers arrive at Lake Crystal. Among them is Chris, who is troubled by visions from the past where she was attacked in the woods by a deformed monster, only to awake safe in her bed. Determined to face her demons, she and her boyfriend Rick are among the group partying at the Lake but Jason is ready to exact revenge.

programme.title: Sick
programme.desc: While quarantining at her familys lake house during the pandemic, Parker and her best friend are threatened by an unexpected visitor.

programme.title: Lovely, Dark, and Deep
programme.desc: A new back-country ranger travels alone through the dangerous wilderness, hoping to uncover the origins of a tragedy that has haunted her since she was a child.

programme.title: IT
programme.desc: Seven young outcasts in Derry, Maine, are about to face their worst nightmare -- an ancient, shape-shifting evil that emerges from the sewer every 27 years to prey on the towns children. Banding together over the course of one horrifying summer, the friends must overcome their own personal fears to battle the murderous, bloodthirsty clown known as Pennywise.

programme.title: Bram Stokers Dracula
programme.desc: Retelling of the classic horror tale about Count Dracula, a 15th-century prince who is condemned to live off the blood of the living for eternity. Young lawyer Jonathan Harker is sent to Draculas castle to finalise a land deal, but when the Count sees a photo of Harkers fiancee, Mina, the image of his dead wife, he imprisons him and sets off for London to track her down.

programme.title: Hollow Man
programme.desc: After years of experimentation, brilliant but arrogant scientist Sebastian Caine has discovered a way to make matter invisible. Determined to achieve the ultimate breakthrough, Caine pushes his team to move to the next phase - using himself as the subject. The test is a success, but when the process cant be reversed, Caine seems doomed to a future without flesh.

programme.title: Friday the 13th, Part II
programme.desc: Jason returns to avenge the death of his decapitated mother with a pitchfork and a thirst for blood. Teenagers at a nearby camp fall prey to the killer in the woods in this hillbilly horror flick.

programme.title: Out of Darkness
programme.desc: A desperate band of early humans finds a new land to settle in some 45,000 years ago. As they start to realise that something monstrous is hunting them down, they must confront a horrifying danger that they never could have imagined.

programme.desc: A desperate band of early humans finds a new land to settle in some 45,000 years ago. As they start to realise that something monstrous is hunting them down, they must confront a horrifying danger that they never could have imagined.

programme.title: Caddo Lake
programme.desc: When an 8-year-old girl mysteriously vanishes, a series of past deaths and disappearances start to link together, forever altering a broken familys history.

programme.title: Amongst the Wolves
programme.desc: Danny, an ex-soldier homeless in Dublin, meets Will, a teen fleeing a drug gang. Their encounter forces them to confront their pasts while navigating the harsh realities they face.

programme.title: Mob Cops
programme.desc: When a retired NYPD detective writes a book about his familys ties to the mob, it ignites a firestorm between dirty cops working for a brutal crime boss and the officers trying to bring them to justice.

programme.title: American Star
programme.desc: An assassin on his last assignment travels to Fuerteventura to kill a man hes never met.

programme.title: There Will Be Blood
programme.desc: Ruthless silver miner, turned oil prospector, Daniel Plainview moves to oil-rich California. Using his adopted son HW to project a trustworthy, family-man image, Plainview cons local landowners into selling him their valuable properties for a pittance. However, local preacher Eli Sunday suspects Plainviews motives and intentions, starting a slow-burning feud that threatens both their lives.

programme.title: Psycho
programme.desc: Gus Van Sants remake of the Hitchcock classic about an embezzler who checks into a remote motel run by a psychopath. While remaining faithful to the original, the modern setting and slightly more explicit shots than the censor would allow in Hitchcocks day make this a fascinating exercise that compares favourably to the original.

programme.title: RocknRolla
programme.desc: Small-time crooks One Two and Mumbles decide to legitimately invest in some prime real estate and find themselves out of their depth and in debt to old-school London gangster Lenny Cole. Cole himself is in the middle of a business deal with a Russian gangster, but when his accountant tips off One Two and Mumbles to the details of an upcoming big-money business transaction, the two scallywags swoop in and steal the cash.

programme.title: Vantage Point
programme.desc: While on a Global War on Terror summit in Spain, the president of the United States falls victim to an attempted assassination. Seen from different perspectives, the event is told and re-told by the presidents bodyguards and members of the audience.

programme.title: The Perfect Storm
programme.desc: Seafaring drama based on the true story of a commercial fishing boat crew who become caught in a terrifying storm off the coast of Massachusetts. In the autumn of 1991, a fishing boat captain is determined to set sail despite the adverse weather conditions, but when the ice machine breaks down his decision to brave the storm rather than lose his catch results in a battle against 100ft waves.

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: Madame Au Lait is cleaning the clockhouse so Tommy and Tallulah take their jammy sandwiches to their room to eat. When some jam gets splodged on a blanket, they dont want to upset Madame Au Lait so they clean it themselves, but when they hang it out to dry on Pufferty, it floats off and lands in a muddy puddle! Whatever will Madame Au Lait say.

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: Chikidee is making slow but steady progress learning to fly, so Tommy and Tallulah try to help by making her a gigantic paper aeroplane. They dont realise, until its too late, that Chikidee cant control it and has no idea how to land! Chime Time is imminent but they cant leave their friend adrift in the sky. How can they talk her down safely?

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: Tommy and Tallulah offer to do the polishing so that Madame Au Lait can make their favourite fruity trifle. While she is out buying the ingredients, the twins go polish crazy, thinking that the more they use the happier Madame Au Lait will be and the more trifle she will make. The clockhouse is gleaming when Madame Au Lait returns, but when she sets a hoof on the floor she finds that it as slippery as an ice rink.

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: The twins are asked to collect McCogginss bell for a town performance. Despite Battersbys warning that the clapper is fragile and doesnt have a spare, Tommy and Tallulah manage to break it. Deciding that they must make a replacement, they look everywhere for something to use and try some very unusual options. Will the bell be ready for Chime Time?

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: When Tommy and Tallulah agree to babysit the spring chicks while Madame Au Lait tends to Mother Chicks hurt wing, they dont realise that how much of a handful the chicks will be. The twins are also taking part in the town kite display today, but somehow the chicks end up surfing on their kite, high in the sky! The twins must stage an airborne rescue before Chime Time.

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: Tommy and Tallulah are organising McCogginss pile of interesting junk when a vitally important spring goes missing. They cant chime the time without it! The twins chase the spring all over town as it bounces around causing chaos, eventually ending up attaching Pufferty to his kennel. Every time he tries to go somewhere, the spring pulls him back.

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: McCoggins tells the twins not to stray far, but they forget to warn Pufferty when they try to teach him how to play hide and seek. There are not many places in Tickety Town big enough to hide a huge dog train, so Pufferty heads far off into the hills. Where can he be? The race is on to find him by Chime Time.

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: Tommy and Tallulah find harvesting very slow when they volunteer to pick Lopsiloos vegetables. Surely there must be some way to speed it up? programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: Tickety Town is covered in fallen leaves, so Tommy and Tallulah are using McCogginss new prototype street sweeper to clear them. However, in their eagerness to speed things up, they go against his instructions and press the turbo button. Suddenly, the sweeper goes haywire, rampaging through town and sucking up anything in its path, including Madame Au Laits clock key and very nearly Hopparoo too.

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: The whole town gathers to take part in McCoggins treasure hunt. Whoever finds the most cogs will be the winner. Knowing that McCoggins hides the cogs in the same places every year, Tommy and Tallulah are cruising to victory, until they realise that a quick win will spoil everyones day, but when they borrow McCoggins special clockwork rollerskates to put the cogs back, the skates zoom out of control.

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: The twins decide that everyone must get active and turn Tickety town into a boot camp. With Tommy banging his drum and Tallulah blowing on her trumpet, soon everyone is lifting, running, puffing and panting. They are all so exhausted that they fall fast asleep, but with Chime Time imminent, they must find a way to wake up Puffertys wheels.

programme.title: Tickety Toc

Banding together over the course of one horrifying summer, the friends must overcome their own personal fears to battle the murderous, bloodthirsty clown known as Pennywise.

programme.title: Never Mind the Buzzcocks
programme.sub-title: Pepsi and Shirlie/ Martin Fry/Debbie Gibson/Judi Love
programme.desc: Pepsi and Shirlie, Martin Fry, Debbie Gibson and Judi Love join the regulars for the legendary pop culture panel shows revival, hosted by Greg Davies.

programme.title: Formula 1
programme.desc: At the Autodromo Hermanos Rodríguez, positions for the Mexico City Grand Prix are set with F1 qualifying as the drivers look to battle their way through to Q3 for a shot at pole.

programme.title: The Force: North East
programme.desc: The dog unit deal with a man who has barricaded himself in his house with a Rottweiler inside. Plus a woman thought to have overdosed disappears.

programme.title: The Leftovers
programme.desc: Kevin goes to a therapist; Tom and Christine wind up in a precarious situation; Meg tries to decide if she can let go of her past; Jill and Aimee follow Nora Durst.

programme.title: Most Haunted
programme.desc: Yvette Fielding and the team are by the seaside in Brighton to snoop around an ancient manor believed to be haunted by a murdered nun whose body was found in a drain some 200 years after her death. Was she killed by a monk with whom she had a clandestine affair?

programme.desc: Yvette Fielding and the team investigate an aircraft base in Sunderland, and encounter two spectral military figures with very different reputations.

programme.title: Formula 1
programme.desc: Racing returns to Mexico for 2022 as 71 laps of the Autodromo Hermanos Rodriguez await. Max Verstappen picked up the race win here in 2021 on his way to a maiden world championship.

programme.title: Formula 1
programme.desc: Seventy-one laps of the Autodromo Hermanos Rodriguez starts here as the lights go out at the 2023 Mexico City Grand Prix. Max Verstappen has won the previous two races here.

programme.title: Formula 1
programme.desc: The lights go out for the 2024 Mexico City Grand Prix, as 71 laps of Autodromo Hermanos Rodriguez unfold. Max Verstappen took top step last year, with Lewis Hamilton finishing P2.

programme.title: Formula 1
programme.desc: Its lights out at the Circuit of The Americas for the United States Grand Prix. Charles Leclerc topped the podium here last year - the Monegasques latest race win for Ferrari.

programme.title: Killer Couples
programme.desc: "Killer Couples" is in the same vein of the long-running true-crime series "Snapped," which tells stories of people who commit murder or attempt murder, but with a focus on couples who commit crimes. Using re-creations and firsthand accounts, each episode digs into a case, telling the story of the couples romance, how the relationship evolved from love to manipulation, and what ultimately led the couple to commit the crime. The stories range from teenage lovers who go on a multistate crime spree to lesbian lovers who want to eliminate one of their husbands.
